title: Goal-Oriented Physical Education Program for International Students

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic physical activities and fundamental language communication skills
context.additional_context: Program optimized for real-time video classes via smartphones, aiming to enhance understanding of physical activities through intercultural exchange

learning_goals: Learners can select a suitable strategy among three goal-orientation types (mastery, performance, avoidance) to develop a weekly physical activity plan.
Learners can design cultural exchange activities mediated by physical activities and share them with peer learners at least twice.
Learners can confirm through self-assessment and peer assessment that they have achieved at least 80% of their goals by the end of the short-term course.

resources: Simple Physical Education Tools (Jump Ropes, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
